website_summaries.verdict: One of the best budget backdrop stands for beginning hobbyist and professional portrait photographers.
pros: Large stand is easy to assemble and disassemble with the included crossbar segments
The kit comes with a carrying case and clamps to secure a backdrop
cons: The storage bag is poor quality, often missing zippers and having stray threads that unravel

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS If it was possible!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: I searched for many many backdrops that weren't overpriced but would still hold up and be sturdy enough for a party. I have used it a total of three times, and each time it sets up in about 5 minute with one person! Mine came wth a carrying case & was missing the sandbags and clips, I contacted the seller and they shipped them out to me super fast just in time for my event. I added the pictures so you could see that you don't need to be an expert to use it :)
customer_reviews.author: Hoyuky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and carry cause it comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and carry cause it comes with a case. Used it for a babyshowe party and it looks and held up good.
customer_reviews.author: rovi

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for and it ain't much.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, and itsn't much. Needed a portable background stand. My usual is a studio wall mounted roller system. Should have realized from the price that it was going to be a disaster. No doubt the stand will hold a muslin, but it will not hold seamless paper or vinyl. It is unstable and the crossbar is a joke. The manufacturer used the cheapest materials possible. Tried sand bags but at the highest extension it still fell over.
customer_reviews.author: PeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Great hold up even without the weights
customer_reviews.text: Came out great, nice and even. The clips held up the fabric perfectly, didn’t need any modification. I was worried the weight of the fabric would make it tip without the weights on but it didn’t at all. Very stable. Held up all night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in this set!
customer_reviews.text: If you're an amateur photographer or semi professional photographer like myself this set is for you. The price is great and the set itself looks and feels of high quality. I've gotten many compliments about it. I do wish the sandbags came with actual weights but no biggie. The clamps are super strong and sturdy. The fact the you can adjust the height and width is also another great thing about this set i paired mine with the Julius Studio Muslin backdrop 5 piece set and haven't had any issues. Great value all around. Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. RogersTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I can't believe how easy this is to use and adjust! I was able to set it up quickly without reading the instructions. I hung four backdrops on it and flipped them over the back so I could quickly take more photos. I compacts easily for storage and is pretty lightweight
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: A nice, amateur photographer's backdrop kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice photographer's backdrop stand for the price. The unit is designed well and assembles very quickly and easily. It is sturdy and stable for hanging light-weight backdrops. It is small diameter tubular metal, so when fully extended would not be adequate to hold heavy materials as it would likely bow in the middle. It is a nice bonus that the carry case, bag weights, and clamps are included with the stand instead of having to purchase separately. The connectors, fasteners, and pole clamps are lightweight plastic, so this stand is probably not recommended for heavy-duty, frequent, professional use. This unit met my expectations and fit my needs perfectly, so I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Kunes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my backdrop! A little flexible so I used plain clear packaging tape to reinforce the connecting point in the middle to keep from sagging. It worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: elektra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, great product! Arrived on time and met my party needs....a little wobbly but the sandbags helped greatly...one sandbag had a broken zipper...no time to return so I used duck tape. I love the storage bag too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Byard

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. So frustrated. It arrived, I attempted To put it together but unfortunately the two rods that are supposed to click into each other are the exact same size so it doesn’t connect. Defective equipment. They should really get rid of this manufacture it seems like every 25th delivery there is something wrong. Clearly they have consistency issues at their production house coupled with cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Admirer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I was excited at first this was going to be perfect to use to have a background at my bridal shower, it took almost 8 days to arrive and then i finally set it up to test it out, and not only does the top rod not want to stay extended, only one of the poles on the side slowly slides down leaving the whole thing crooked. What a waste of 35$ ! & That’s a lot of money to waste when your trying to pay for a wedding
customer_reviews.author: Baileybaby22

customer_reviews.title: Cannot connect top rail
customer_reviews.text: Zipper tab missing on bag, rubber cushions on bottom of legs flimsy and broken - but the worst part ( waiting to hear from seller) bolts where crossbars attach to legs with the wingnuts - not long enough to get wing nuts attached and stable. Lets see what seller does for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this stand so much but after purchasing it twice, it’s definitely time to let it go. I wanted a cheaper option for a backdrop stand since I had multiple parties to host this summer. Unfortunately different parts kept breaking on the item. One the first purchase the stand wouldn’t stay up. The second time the piece on the top broke off. If you need a backdrop for multiple parties I wouldn’t suggest. However if it’s a one and done situation it should work! Also! Don’t open package the day of party. Inspect beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Jauniyah

customer_reviews.title: I just don't understand the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I read through most of the reviews here and came to the conclusion a lot of people were trying to use it for purposes beyond its intent. When you do that, things seldom work properly. One seemingly legitimate complaint however, was the difficulty of assembling it and the flimsy, broken, non-existent, or broken parts. Nothing could have been further from the truth with mine; I had it assembled within fifteen minutes out of the packaging without even glancing at the instruction sheet! If you've ever used a camera tripod, or a music stand, you can master this is no time! At this price point, you can't expect it to be professional-grade but for the amateur photographer, it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great backdrop frame! Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: This frame was an excellent last-minute purchase and it made our holiday market much more exciting. I used it to prop up a winter tapestry. It easily held the heavy canvas, plus tinsel curtains and lights without wobbling. The stand itself is not weighted on the bottom but sandbags are not required to keep it in place. It stays up unless you actually forcefully knock into it. It folds up nicely into the travel bag and assembles pretty quickly. I'd definitely recommend it for a DIY project like ours, but if you're doing a pro photoshoot, you may need to upgrade a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Christina Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This item is so easy to put together. And disassembled really easy. They carry bag its heavy duty but a huge plus! You may have a hard time fitting sandbags in the carry bag if they are full of sad (did not try yet). I have never used one of these before so I dont understand how the clamps work but i wish they sent 4 instead of 3. I'll have to watch a video on youtube I guess. Does come with instructions. Nice and light to carry, again without the sand. I could def see needing the sandbags to stabilize if your using a heavy background. I'll be tying ribbon to the bar for a backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product. This is very flemsy
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. This is very flemsy. I only used it three times this month and it did not hold up. The stand pieces will not adjust properly, one piece was bent and I didn't realize it till after using it one time. So now I can't readjust the stand during photo shoots properly. Also to other pole at the top that connects the two stands together will not readjust again to fit back into the bag. So now I am going to have to get another stand. I was hoping that this would last for a while. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but it's not stable with only the 2 EMPTY sand bags !
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to assemble BUT with the 2 empty bags, the product is not stable. So before using it, don't forget to buy some sand. With only the empty sandbag included in the box, the product is not stable The description is ambiguous "Premium Quality Sand Bag" and all the pictures show 2 prefilled sandbags. The other equivalent products were explicitly stated in their description or product pictures "SANDBAGS ARE EMPTY AND DO NOT COME PREFILLED WITH SAND OR WEIGHTS". Before contacting the seller, I read some reviews and then I realized that I'm not the first customer to have this issue. The seller has still not changed the description to resolve this ambiguity => 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Franck

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to give bad reviews but I have to warn you! This was my second time purchasing this stand, I thought maybe the first one just has some malfunctions. Wrong! the second one was just as bad. Parts break easily, cheaply made, not sturdy at ALL, I was able to get three uses out of one stand and then it just gives out. Please do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolates De Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand in April 2018 and used it many, many times at indoor and outdoor events I went to over the last 2 years. The carrying bag makes it easy to store or take anywhere. The top bar was hard for me to take apart several times but with practice, it did get easier. The overall stand is not as sturdy as I would like but it gets the job done. If you take care of the stand, it will take care of you. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Marie Blas

customer_reviews.title: Sets up in seconds & super light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a wall divider to use when I am working events and doing Reiki sessions or readings. It provides an extra level of privacy to allow my clients the space to ‘be’ without feeling too vulnerable or like they’re on display. This literally sets up in seconds and is so very simple! It’s also super light and convenient to carry in it’s provided case. Makes that walk from the parking lot into the event so much easier when doing set up and tear down. Bonus points that it doubles as a back-drop for my recording studio!! Thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I would have given 5 stars except the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars except the fact that I ordered two and one of them worked perfectly and the other was defective. My advice is to order ahead in enough time to open them up and test prior to use. The one with the rose gold flowers had to be rigged due to a piece being broken and one side wouldn't tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tash

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later and NOT happy
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap. I've had it a year and I'm ready to throw it away. Pieces get stuck all the time and I can't lower or raise it. It's not easy to adjust. It fell over over and the top metal bar is such cheap metal that just hitting the floor dented and shredded THE METAL where the bars connect, making it extremely difficult (and frustrating) to raise the height. It's currently stuck on one side- I can't get it to raise any higher; the bar just won't move up. So now it's useless to me. I expect more than a year from a product. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFurg

customer_reviews.title: Review the Item!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. You can adjust the size very easily and quickly. One thing though it is a little flimsy. Also the seller will send you countless amounts of emails after the item has arrived asking you to review it, I figured after the fourth email I should just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this stand because of the great amount of mixed reviews. Unfortunately, I think I got one of the bad ones or I am doing something wrong because it is VERY flimsy. The minimal air kept blowing it down. I put on a very thin cotton curtain with some foil curtains and that was already to heavy. I tried the sand bags and it did not keep it down. I had to move it to the inside of the canopy and use zip ties to attach it to the tubes of the canopy in order for it to stay. If I hadn’t already used it, I would return for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Nieto

customer_reviews.title: It's only a bit over 5 feet tall!
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this purchase! I pulled it out of the box a few weeks ago to set it up for a kid's Birthday party and it was my height and I'm 5"2. It is nowhere near 10 feet high as it claims! I couldn't use it for the party's backdrop and can't use it for anything else but maybe hanging clothes to dry on!
customer_reviews.author: KARLA M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for thyou price - handled more than was probably intended with no issues...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. I extended them to their full height and shoved a bunch of sheets on them (14 56-inch panels) for a background, as well as hung signage on them. Sturdy WITH WEIGHT BAGS. Note the weights bags don’t come “weighted”. Since I didn’t plan ahead, I put a couple water bottles in each pouch to hold t down. Final adjustments should be made after weighted. Really a great buy, and easy to put together without reading instructions. Unlike camping tents, everything fit beautifully in the bags afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for backdrops for photos and other events. It is extremely easy to set up and take down. It would be nice if there were some measurements or markings on the poles so you can make it the same height. As it is, you just have to keep adjusting it, step back and check, and adjust it some more. The plastic pieces around the screws are a little flimsy, you need to be careful to not make it too tight, it could break. Overall, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stand!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a case. Pretty easy to assemble, disassemble and carry in the case. It does come with "sand bags" that you can fill up with sand or rocks. Definitely need to use the sand bags if you plan on using the stand when its windy outside! I love how long you can make it and it holds up well! Best purchase ever! (That or you can go rent a stand for almost the same price from a party rental and have to give it back!) (For reference we were able to make the stand long enough to have 8 adults stand side by side in front of it)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it is very lightweight. Worked out for me at multiple events. I am not a professional photographer or use very heavy backdrops though. I have used well a 10x10 backdrop on it. This is so much worth it’s weight and value. If you’re a beginner photographer or party planner or always on the go and want something cute for your parties, I recommend this! I have not used any sand bags with this though so maybe it could hold heavier backdrops but I’m not too certain with the middle bar.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dabbling in Photography and decided to purchase this item on a whim on Amazon Day. The drawback is that I didn't open the packaging until a few weeks later when a co-worker was looking for a backdrop stand for his family members event. The stand is sturdy and well made, but the only problem was that the center connector of the top bar did not fit into each bar. The issue had to be resolved with an allen wrench, but had I been within the return window I would've requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: The FED Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Better than excpected
customer_reviews.text: I work as a newborn photographer and constantly travel to clients homes for sessions. I was desperately looking for a sturdy backdrop stand and came across this specific one. I've bought one off Amazon in the past from a different vendor but it was way too flimsy to hold a roll of seamless. This particular one has been such a breeze to travel with and set-up. Very happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how people who purchased this is getting good ratings but I have not been able to contact anybody. Shipment came in and the extension rods was missing. Emailed multiple times because that's all they gave me. Worst customer service ever! Product is cheap. You get what you pay for. Everything is flimsy. Don't buy if you want something durable.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Missing clamps, even after contacting seller, but nice stand
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stand, however, the clamps shown were missing. I contacted the seller via email and their response was prompt that they would send out the clamps to me. However, when I received the package for the missing clamps, it contained only 1 clamp, not 3 as pictured. The stand itself is great, and would give 5 stars, easy to put together and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: A P Miller

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value. All the pieces come apart and fold into a compact bag. I was actually able to stuff the backdrop materials (not included btw) into the bag as well. Only thing is when you're assembling it, like a tripod there are two points of extension. One point came out easily while the second point flustered me a little. I had to get a screwdriver to unscrew something that was holding it back. Once I got the fit right it seemed to extend and compact just fine, but I threw the screwdriver into the bag as a dedicated tool for this backdrop frame. Very large, great for events of all sizes at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Good Setup For Photography and Projectors.
customer_reviews.text: This kit does exactly what it’s intended to do. It takes about 10 minutes to get everything set up and adjusted. The height adjustments are easy and solid. The width adjustment is easy, you basically just pull/push the bars across. It’s fairly stable - the legs can be opened/closed a good amount. The sandbags are a nice extra. In addition to using this as a photo backdrop, I use it to hold the screen for my mini projector. I use the included clamps and a set of shower curtain hooks to pull the screen tight. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elly820

customer_reviews.title: Great green screen frame
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and returned another one last week because it didn't fit my needs- I had to practically sit on top of it to get it to fit my computer screen. This one was super simple to assemble- it took 5 minutes. It's sturdy, adjustable and exactly what I need to create videos in my home studio. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Decent For The Price
customer_reviews.text: If not for the price, I would have given this thing 3 stars as it can be dreadfully difficult to assemble at any given time, with a lot of small pieces that are easily lost and not so easily replaced. The materials- and bars especially- feel flimsy and easily bent/ broken, and it takes two people to assemble the top part; otherwise it will take you a lot longer to get it up and the background sheet in place. So, if you're going to use this for doing self-tape auditions in your home or studio, make sure you have a lot of extra time to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Juvi Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Integral parts missing
customer_reviews.text: My product was missing the wing-nuts and washers to connect the crossbar to the stands. I’ve contacted the seller about this. Product gets 2 stars until then. It seems durable enough for the price, but I can’t tell until I can put it together. The stands fold and collapse as expected. The crossbar goes together and comes apart as expected. The sandbags, carrying bag, and clips are all as expected. Just waiting to hear back from seller as I cannot currently use the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lena V.

customer_reviews.title: A Stand Out Support System
customer_reviews.text: This not a heavy-duty backdrop system you would find in a professional studio. But it wasn't advertised to be. At the same time, I don't know any professional who would refuse to use this support system for small projects. The system is an excellent option for amateur and semi-professional photographers who are looking to set up a small home studio. I use mine to support a green screen for video interviews. Works perfectly. And the results look professional. Including the sandbags indicates that this vendor has thought out the system and the real needs of a background support system. The construction is sold and the price is right. I recommend this background support system.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I required a stand for a backdrop I was putting together. I was going to make the stand but was running out of time. I decided to purchase this stand and hope it would be sturdy enough. I stretched out the stand as far as it went and threw on the boxwood shrub (which has a decent weight to them) in the middle. There was a little droop but still seemed sturdy. Overall, the stand held up (as is in the picture) for 2 weeks with no problem. Very easy to put together and take down. Takes little space for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching. Don’t recommend. Don’t ignore the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item months before the event so that I may have an opportunity to test assembling it together. It was very easy to assemble. I was excited and thought I made good investment. I WAS WRONG! Days before the event, I attempted to assemble this item again and it literally fell apart! The center pole broke, the clips broke, the screw clips cracked...it was a nightmare. Everything just fell apart. I had to use tape so that the item could be used for the event! I threw it away afterwards. DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iphone owner - Case Review

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for indoor photoshoots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a model and needed to something for at home photo shoots. This stand was very easy to set up. It worked great indoors. Very lightweight and easy to move around. However, it did not do too well outside. the wind knocked it over every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Product is greatly priced, and is 7ft.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, especially for price. I read a review ( after I bought product), and was scared to receive since other person repeatedly stated product was not 7ft, and was so upset. Once I received backdrop, I quickly realized that person had no idea how to set it up. First off my 15 year old daughter and 1 friend set it up alone (easy set up), secondly the feet of the poles have an adjustable height using a thumb screw knob. Yes it can stay at 5ft. But go up to 7ft as well. Just simply loosen thumb screw, then push down on feet until they reach the desired height.
customer_reviews.author: matilda browning

customer_reviews.title: Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: 1.) Not sturdy at all depending on the weight it will sink in the middle of you fully extend it. 2.) Inaccurate description of the size. My husband stood next to it and it was like a foot short than what the package said. 3.) Layout of the stand is not correct. To connect to another pole was pain because it was one is too big to fit the other one. The pole connected to the top couldn’t be screwed on because there is no room.
customer_reviews.author: vatha vann

customer_reviews.title: easy installation
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to do some photo shoots of myself for social media and of my product line. This was very easy to put together. It seems it will be even sturdier once I put sand in the bags. Don't forget it does not come with a back drop, I just used this sheer curtain as an example. It has a nice carrying case and very light in weight. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Shops-A-lot Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset I needed this for an event no response from seller but the screws at the top one of my poles was too short so I couldn’t even get the bolt over it and it wasn’t secure. It appeared someone returned this before. I’m Extremely disappointed I don’t think it’s 10ft either I’m only 5’6 and I had it as high as it could go more like 6ft not 10ft
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand to use with a backdrop I also purchased for an Ugly Christmas Sweater party I was throwing. We had over 80 guests and they all loved it. The stand took less than 5 minutes to set up, it was plenty sturdy (I used indoors, but I plan to use outdoors this summer for my annual Luau party too). It comes with two bags you can either put sand or weights in to prevent tipping in windy areas. It comes with a very nice carry bag, three clips the stand and two sand/weight bags. I would highly recommend purchasing this stand, great quality, cost and so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: The total package of four is because it wasn’t even with instructions to put this together and it doesn’t stand it high as we anticipated so after two total props and some other things needed we finally were able to get it up if you’re not gonna have the time to fill the bags of sand which the empty bags are provided for you to do on your own then you might as well stick to taking things to the wall easy to carry simple to break down I definitely recommend it and don’t plan on returning it because it Works for the price
customer_reviews.author: PureRomance by Taya

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of great uses for these stands.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. I use them to hang fabrics on and create a sort of 'fence' around my RV when camping. They can be used to set up for a bit of privacy. The image here shows two racks used to create privacy between my RV and another that was parked literally right behind the fabric at a camp recently. They fold up nice and stow in the RV just fine. I used Ziploc bags filled with sand inserted in the weight bags that came with the racks and keep them stowed in the RV as well to use as needed. So think out of the box. There are multiple uses for these racks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much, I ordered a second one...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this equipment. Reasonably priced. Will be using this for a photo booth at an anniversary party for guests to have their picture taken to put in the guest book. I did order more of the clamps because this set only comes with 3 and I needed additional clamps to hold my different backdrop decorations. After I received the first one, I ordered a second one because I liked it so much and will be able to use the second backdrop behind a food / serving table.
customer_reviews.author: Kara M.

customer_reviews.title: Home DIY quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits and does what its suppose to. But, its not high quality. The threads are cheaply cut. I had to oil almost everything to make it all move and slide well. And most importantly, the metal is thin. This is limited to just a DIY kinda thing. Its something that won't last long and needs to be handled gently. For $40 is it worth it? Yeah, but not a dollar more. It'll get you through home YouTube videos and stuff like that
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Unusable - crossbars don't fit each other
customer_reviews.text: I can't use it. The crossbar doesn't fit into the other crossbar as shown. It's too big for the hole it's supposed to go in. I want either a replacement or my money back. I contacted the customer service email that came with the set and have received no reply. Edit: Tried to order a replacement and the crossbars fit - but only one side had a hole to install it onto the support pieces! Waste of time and a waste of money. Don't count on Amazon to help either. The package I got was beat up and opened, looked like it was probably someone else's return.
customer_reviews.author: Ileia

customer_reviews.title: Disapponted...Only 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I had my Stand for quite some time and only used it for 3 occasions as a backdrop. Well for my 4th background, which was going to be a graduation stand for 2020 graduates, my stand broke right before the event. I was so sad. It snapped on both ends. The top bar broke away for the two legs. The screws were placed properly. My background was not heavy at all. It was a sheet and stickers. The stand was good while it lasted; yet it is a little difficult to assemble and to take a part. You need to use some extra strength.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price for a versatile item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has multiple uses. I've used it to hold many photography style backgrounds for teaching online classes, and also to hold curtains and separate a room in our basement. Easy to use, and comes with 3 clips that we've also used for several things around the house. The clips are currently holding up curtains on a window temporarily in our rental house. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Annunaki Utonium

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time & with all the pieces. Recommend practice set up since it does take a bit longer to figure it out at first. Worked perfect, didn’t require use of sandbags. Even added another curtain rod zip tied to the top bar (I needed to add a layer of material) & still had zero issues w balancing w two full sets of sheer curtains & flower decorations.
customer_reviews.author: ND.momof3

customer_reviews.title: Quality is meh.
customer_reviews.text: This would be absolutely perfect for me. I am a semi pro photographer and take portraits of my growing boys. But when the package came the quality left something to be desired. One of the legs is bent out of the box and so far renders one side unusable. Update: my husband was able to bend the leg and i was able to set it up. Good little unit. Updating to 3 stars though quality is still low. If I was a portrait photog and needed this every day then definitely not. But the 5 or 6 times a year I'll use it, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: A Girl Named Evan

customer_reviews.title: This particular order was not good.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these stands and love them. So, I decided to purchase another one. This one, doesn't work properly. The 2 pieces that make the crossbar, the part of one that is to be inserted into the other, is too large to fit. I have to used a pair of pliers to squeeze it together each time to assemble it. It still will not go but about 1/2 way in. then it is even harder to take it apart after use. It literally takes 3 people to assemble this one piece and 2 to take it apart! If this had been the first one I had ever purchased I would have never bought more!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap set, I definitely wonder if it would be able to hold any backgrounds that have some weight to them. It’s very difficult (nearly impossible) to get the twist knobs tight enough to keep the extension bars from slipping under any kind of pressure. I’ll have to buy something more sturdy, def feels like I just threw my money away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and travel friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Not what we were hoping for idk but i thought it came with sandbags. The item is good for a traveling photographer. Ita just not what we were needing. I was hoping to use it as a room divider/picture background. In the end we just screwed some fabric into the ceiling to create the division needed. I do recommend this item either way. I was able to set it uo ans figure it out in less than 10 mins without using the lil instruction booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybuggggs

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and take down! Quality is ok, but it’s definitely not bad for the price. At ten feet extend the central bar tends to sway a bit under a ten foot cotton background. This is easily fixed if you have a spare light stand and background clip.
customer_reviews.author: These reviews are mine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is a little flimsy but you can still drap light material but it did the job. The stand was not difficult to set up I was able to put it together by myself. Getting the stand to level out was a little challenging but I managed. If you are going to have it outdoors make sure it is not to windy and i would not recommed anyone to lean on it. It defiently was a hit. Overall, its a good buy and I will use this for other parties.
customer_reviews.author: odie

customer_reviews.title: It's great and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of space to film and with how the feet of this stand are you cannot put it flush to the wall, but other than that it is really easy to put together, easy to move and I have not had issues with it at all. I use it for pictures, to put behind me while Live Streaming, or to use to record my youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lyn Oberstadt

customer_reviews.title: Only one good use out of it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when i first got it. But after my second time using it one side falls constantly. It was embarassing bringing it to use at a party and it being crooked and having to take it down. Although its inexpensive you really get what you pay for :(
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an event I have coming up in December and I'm really glad I tried to put it together now. I couldn't get the pole to insert into the other pole because there was a piece of the metal lip preventing it from attaching. I wasn't going to rig it to make it work. I did get the legs put up and they were easy enough but super flimsy. This thing is very easy to knock over. I thought it was nice it came with multiple carrying bags but that's about all the good I have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Way way worth the price. Its a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to set up a backdrop for behind our (bride and groom) reception table. I put it together and it was easy. I added all my stuff to it and it held like a champ. It was so big that i was really impressed. After the wedding i plan on using it to do some photography, and also to hold a white sheet for a movie projector screen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal whitley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy product. The center bar moves freely and there’s no way to lock it in place. Nor did it come with instructions. So I have no idea if I’ve put it together right or not. But I don’t know how else it would go together other than the way I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together by myself in about 5 minutes the first time out of the bag. Okay, maybe like 7 minutes, because I forgot to run my backdrop curtain through it at first. I only used it at about a 6-foot width but I was super pleased with it! It made it so much easier to to a backdrop than trying to tape/tack a bunch of crap to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: isonian

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The background stand came with instructions and was super easy to assemble. It was light and easy to move. The only downfall was that even after weighing it down with the bags provided, it kept shifting and I had to adjust it several times throughout the day. The top bars would slide together, shortening the stand, so I had to tape it in the middle. However, for the amount of money that i paid, I would say it was good value. I would not recommend this for outdoor use, it’s too lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely flimsy, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels, looks, and stands up looking extremely cheap. Extremely flimsy, sags in the middle, easily tips over at any height. Poles are off width's making it impossible to find clams that will secure screen to it. ex. 1.75" clamps work on the top pole, a 2" clamp on the second pole is too loose fitting but the pole is too large for a 1.75" clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don't wait!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and so worth the money. Prefect for any event. Just like the ones in those fancy portrait studios. However this is not as durable. It will or can break if your item is heavy. Or the fabric is really heavy. We used thin curtains as a backdrop. About 6 of them. I wouldn't let kids play around it... Worth it for us. This thing goes 8-9 feet high and the same across. Seriously enough room for your whole crew to get in.. We did.. For the price you can't beat. Oh and it comes with a travel/storage bag, clips and sand bags... Told you perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Easy but sand must be purchased separately
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my grandma's birthday party to create a photo booth effect. My cousin put it together with a little assistance in about 7 minutes. He did have some difficulty fitting the two cross bars together. It came down easy too and fit back into the travel bag no problem. We were inside so we didn't need to use the sand bags. It even stayed up when the little kids were running around it and pulling on the fabric and hiding behind the curtain. Totally worth the money and I will be using it again for future events and photo shoots.
customer_reviews.author: ThaRealMrsHenry

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Quality really terrible! In my box it was no sand bags andclothespins . Smell with plastic and visual really cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This has got be one of the best purchases I made for my daughters birthday party. As you can see in the photo, it held up a fabric backdrop, curtains and a balloon garland. I didn’t even need the weights it comes with. I love that I was able to adjust the height and weight to our needs. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Returned because cross beam was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I reordered this item because I liked the original purchase, which I left with family to use as a backdrop when doing shows close to them. The reordered item was not the same, which is happening more and more often on Amazon items. Not only was it different, it was defective, and I had to start over finding a backdrop support to suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Drop Stand
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the green screen backdrop for my son to use while making videos. It is light weight enough that it is easy to store, set up and take down, but it is not light weight enough that it falls down. It can not hold more than one backdrop, but it works great for one. I would recommend it for anyone looking for a simple backdrop support stand, cause it has everything that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke while putting it together..
customer_reviews.text: Soon as I put the poles together the lock broke. Very flimsy. Not sturdy at all. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Fairly sturdy. Light weight and easy to move around when needed. What I did not like was that it was shorter than I would have liked so it made it difficult to stand in front of a backdrop without having to stoop down. Ended up not using it for what I wanted to in the first place. Might find a use for it later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, compact, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little set. I really love how compact it is and how it all fits in the bag - super lightweight and easy to carry. My reason for deducting a star is because the two crossbar pieces are somewhat difficult to fit together and pull apart. I can do it but it takes a lot of force and I'm hoping with continued use it'll slide easier. Other than that, everything else about this set is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, set up, take down, light weight. Very easy to store. Perfect size, live being able to adjust the width. I feel like the smaller one is just too small. I use this one a lot, even to set up cute photo booths for events
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Very good to excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this package was a really great deal. All items are of very good to excellent quality from the sandbags to the frame to the backdrop to the clips to the carrying bag to the stand. Keep in mind this is not a $200 package so don't expect that level but this fit my needs perfectly. I had a small issue which the seller dealt with in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: jwcbc

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for an indoor event only!
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for an indoor party but outdoors with just a low wind blowing even with the sand bags it's no good. I'm an event planner. It was embarrassing for my whole photo scene to fall over a few times. Tried it again at a sports theme party with extra sand bags & it still blew over & the screw broke out of the pole. Leaving no way to set it back up! Very frustrated. 😞
customer_reviews.author: WHO'S💖THAT💖LADY???

customer_reviews.title: Screws Snap Off
customer_reviews.text: On the second use of this, the screw that was secured to the inside of the side bar snapped off. If you forced it in, it would be functional but then is not sturdy and sometimes just falls off again. After that fell enough times from use, the screw on the other side snapped off too because of the constant tension from falling on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: livingtheCAdream

customer_reviews.title: Is this really 7 ft? It looks shorter.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seperately from the sheet and lights because it looked to be better quality than the kit. I do like that the width is great but this is as tall as It gets and I am doing full body shots for my pictures. I thought that it said 7 ft but this definitely doesn't reach 7 ft...It looks to be about 6-6.5 ft. It was easy to put up. And looks sturdy enough to put up and take down multiple times and that's what I wanted. The bag is a little thin and could've been a bit thicker I hope my poles don't bust through it. But overall it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikeea T.

customer_reviews.title: The stand is great.  The carry bag, less so.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is exactly what I was hoping for, and it's working out perfectly. Someone cut some corners, though, when it came to the carry bag. The zipper looked very flimsy from the moment I opened the box, and sure enough, the slider broke off the very first time I tried to put the stand away after using it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Thornock

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this item to hold our banner for my business when we do shows. The center bar that extends is not sturdy or strong enough. It wobbles too much and doesn't stay extended when in use. One of the floor stands doesn't stay extended either. The bar falls down into the shaft even after tightening the screws. I guess its just a hit or miss when purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri ze Barber

customer_reviews.title: Serious Letdown
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this to come in because I needed an upgrade. I unpackaged it and started to set it up and before I know it, the bolts that are glued into the plastic frame had broken out and could not be fixed. I tried to rig it to last just for the one night I needed it and couldn't make it work so I had to figure out an alternative plan. It's a cheap buy, both in price and quality. I would highly recommend spending good money to get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy enough for general use
customer_reviews.text: Put this together in about 10 minutes or so. Had to fiddle with one of the legs, as the pole was stuck inside itself...Had to loosen up a screw and apply quite a bit of force to get the pole to slide out. Haven't taken it down yet, so not sure if this will be an on-going issue or not. Overall, a decent product. I plan on using this for a Photo Booth backdrop. It seems sturdy enough for general use. I'd recommend it for anyone looking to get a simple set-up going.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Used for more than a picture backdrop
customer_reviews.text: The wind can be a big problem. We used this for photo backdrops and it’s awesome enough to use as a projector for movie nights. Great fabric. We use weights to hold down the poles. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that can arrive fast, hold light-medium backdrop, for inside only, and cheap. Used it twice for inside events, it worked well and totally paid it self off. Can’t beat the price. The product is not sturdy, would not risk taking it outside. The weight of the product is as advertised. I am grateful for this product. Thank you for making a cheap alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Valera

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather have spent $20 more for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: There are two sandbags included. One was not properly sewn and the zipper came right off and was not capable of being fixed. The screw on the stand for attaching the bar are made of aluminum. Easily bent if it falls over, which it did on an outdoor shoot, from the wind. Its hard to expect better for $40, but if you can't make a quality product at that price, just don't.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Specht

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Just add actual backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and I helped set it up the first time. Worked out great and comes with everything you need other than an actual backdrop to hang from it. Clamps hold things in place well, and the side poles go up and down for the right height. They were very happy with this as it worked out great for their photoshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Richrev

customer_reviews.title: No sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble. The only thing is that I hoped to at least be 4 clips, it only came with 3. It probably says it in the description but was really hoping for at least 4. I will need to buy more. Review update: finally installed it . One of the washers would hold on the top right. The screw was too short. Legs wouldn’t stay open, would tighten jobs but didn’t seem to work. Not sturdy! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: arlene vargas

customer_reviews.title: Glamorous backdrop for photographs
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect backdrop for out photo booth! It looks so glamorous! It was easy to install and the carrying case it’s just the cherry on top! The only thing is that it only comes with 2 clamps, we had to buy more in order to keep it straight but even that was no big deal, very happy with the purchase. Really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality, overall appearance, light weight and storage carry case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last minute for a friends wedding. The flexibility of extended the size in height and width was a huge plus! I maximized both with a back drop I purchased. Comes with a carrying case for storage which is nice. Extremely light weight so it needs to be placed in an area accordingly to ensure the integrity of it is not compromised. Came with bags to fill with sand to add weight for securing however I did not need to use. Sturdiness can be challenged when maximizing the extensions due to being light weight. Must evenly distribute the extension rods and tripods for leveling and balancing overall structure integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bruce Ward

customer_reviews.title: I used it once and I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and I like it a lot. I'm just starting to learn how to take pictures with this backdrop set and I'm adding more to my collection of equipment (i.e. lighting, more backdrops & etc.) My only take back is I don't think it comes with enough clips. 3 is their magic number but I'm pretty sure 4 would of helped more, but as I said I'm adding more things. I'll just need to buy more clips as well.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Base seems weaker.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great for beginners like me. It was easy to assemble and disassemble and stored easily. The base is a little too unsteady and not as secure as I wish it were. It does comes with sand bags but I’m afraid the legs would just break or bend under sand pressure. That is really the only flaw.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, especially if you just need a studio occasionally. Make sure that you use the included sandbags for stability. Once you weigh the stands down, you have a backdrop that works outdoors. We shot quilts for submission to an art show in my driveway because that's the best place to get true light. It was windy that day, but the stands held up great and we got the shots we needed to get the work accepted into the show!
customer_reviews.author: sprosser

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: Even easier to assemble than the one I have from Limostudio. Also a great stand, but that one comes in four sections (each rod is 2.5 ft) and this one comes in two sectios with an extending shaft inside both rods so not as much set up and the adjustment is even easier and much more flexible since all you have to do is slide one end out as needed. Both have their stengths so it's just a matter of which works better for you.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble and a really great price! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! When planning and producing a wedding many products pass through your hands and many disappoint but this product was sturdy, easy to assemble and looked lovely with the white sheers and hanging wisteria! Great find more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Julius Studio Photo Video Studio 10 ft. Wide Cross Bar 7.3 ft. Tall Backdrop Stand, Background Support System Kit with Clamp, Sand Bag, Carry Bag, Photography Studio, JSAG283
feature_bullets: 🏆The Kit Includes: [2 pcs] One Male and one female Cross Bar components / [2 pcs] Support Stand / [3 pcs] Photo Clamp / [2 pcs] Sand Bag / [1 pc] Carry Bag
🏆Professional Lightweight Support for Backdrops, Aluminum Alloy Construction for Durability & Portability
🏆Good Flexibility with Width (5.3 ft.–10 ft.) & Height (2.6 ft.–7.3ft.) Adjustment
🏆Holds Canvas, Muslin, Paper / Photo Clamps Provides Comfortable & Strong Grip to Prevent Backdrop Slip-out / Premium Quality Sand Bag
👇Installation Manual Download Available (Scroll down to Product Information)👇

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,794 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
